required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of ABT-957 in Subjects With Mild-to-Moderate Alzheimer's Disease on Stable Doses of Acetylcholinesterase Inhibitors
clinical_study.official_title: A Multiple-Dose Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of ABT-957 in Subjects With Mild-to-Moderate Alzheimer's Disease on Stable Doses of Acetylcholinesterase Inhibitors

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of multiple doses of ABT-957 in subjects with mild to moderate Alzheimer's disease.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic evaluation of the two ABT-957 diastereomers
primary_outcome.description: maximum observed plasma concentration (Cmax), time to Cmax (peak time, Tmax), plasma concentration at the end of the dosing interval (Ctrough), the area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) during each dosing interval (AUC0-12 and AUC12-24)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Routinely for the duration of the study, about 7 months
primary_outcome.description: Subjects will be monitored for clinical and laboratory evidence of adverse events throughout the study

intervention.description: Placebo for ABT-957 administered twice-daily for 7 days
